## Professional Summary

I am a **Senior Statistical Programmer** with over **eight years** of experience in data science and clinical data analysis. I am currently pursuing a **PhD in Statistics** at **Amity University**. My skills include **R**, **Python**, **SAS**, **R Shiny**, **Tableau**, and **Power BI**. I am passionate about **training** and **public speaking**, frequently presenting at **national and international conferences** on **machine learning**, **data visualization**, and **healthcare analytics**. I also have several certifications in data science and statistical programming.
